result.title: MGP Main Color Palette
result.content: This is our Color Palette that follows the MGP Mkt Branding Guidelines. <em>Hover over the color swatches for more info. Go ahead, try it now...

result.title: Code Snippets Are Your Friend
result.content: Code snippets will help guide developers so there is more continuity and consistency with our front-end code. Click the 'code snippet' button below to see it in action.

result.title: Button Styles
result.content: Button styles are here. See below how we can highlight a whole column or row if we want.

result.title: Interactive Charts
result.content: Try clicking on one or more of the names above to narrow down the displayed chart data.

result.title: Bank Account Info
result.content: Start by filling in the information for your bank account.

result.title: Escrow Setup
result.content: Next, provide some information about your company so that we can set up an escrow account for your raise.

result.title: Term Sheet
result.content: Choose which offering instrument you would like to use to raise funds, and then input the details of your offering.

result.title: Offering Memorandum
result.content: Select which exemption you wish to raise funds under.
